imdb.plot outline: It all starts in small town American where a contest on social media calls for the nomination of the local's favorite restaurant to get a $150,000 makeover. As the nominations pour in from the public, the Rock This Restaurant team informs the restaurants that they've been nominated. Nominated restaurants get a once in a lifetime opportunity grow their business. We follow the restaurants in their frenzied campaigns to gain votes from the public. They hand out flyers, use table toppers, posters, and whatever means necessary to get people to vote. The competition between restaurants grows daily as they watch the vote numbers climb online. A local favorite wins. Having suffered a tragic loss and a fire the community is united around the winner. Follow all the fun as the Rock This Restaurant team takes on the challenge of rebuilding a local favorite eatery in just 7 days.
imdb.title: Rock This Restaurant
plot: It all starts in small town American where a contest on social media calls for the nomination of the local's favorite restaurant to get a $150,000 makeover. As the nominations pour in from the public, the _Rock This Restaurant_ (qv) team informs the restaurants that they've been nominated. Nominated restaurants get a once in a lifetime opportunity grow their business. We follow the restaurants in their frenzied campaigns to gain votes from the public. They hand out flyers, use table toppers, posters, and whatever means necessary to get people to vote. The competition between restaurants grows daily as they watch the vote numbers climb online. A local favorite wins. Having suffered a tragic loss and a fire the community is united around the winner. Follow all the fun as the _Rock This Restaurant_ (qv) team takes on the challenge of rebuilding a local favorite eatery in just 7 days.::Rick Metz
